◆ gAngle()

float tnt::doo::objects_sys::gAngle ( object const &  id) const
noexcept

Get the angle of the object in global context.

Parameters
idThe id of the object.
Returns
float
Note
The function returns angle[id] if the object has no parent (aka. parent[id] == -1).
